text: Tipula vittata is a species of fly in the family Tipulidae. It is found in the Palearctic .Fauna EuropaeaBei-Bienko, G.Y. & Steyskal, G.C. (1988) Keys to the Insects of the European Part of the USSR, Volume V: Diptera and Siphonaptera, Parts I, II . Amerind Publishing Co., New Delhi. Pierre, C. , (1924) Diptères : Tipulidae.
